channel.title: AV on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in AV on PlaceOS

item.title: WorkMate
item.description: The first workplace management system to combine out-of-the-box simplicity with enterprise-level configuration & scalability

item.title: StageHand
item.description: Control every AV device in every room on campus — from your browser

item.title: Visitor Management
item.description: Visitor management software so simple, the only thing you do is send the invite, it does everything else

item.title: Room Booking
item.description: A simple, self-hosted room booking app you don’t pay per room per month, you own it

item.title: ASHRAE Headquarters - Net-Zero Retrofit
item.description: ASHRAE is a global society maintaining sustainable standards for the built environment. They are the creator of BACnet, a protocol and set of standards for the HVAC industry.

item.title: Canadian University Campus - Energy Reduction & Sustainability
item.description: This pilot examined the implementation of PlaceOS for automating and synchronizing separate building systems—security access, HVAC, AV, and others—integrated with the university’s scheduling system. The goal was to transform classrooms into smart spaces through enhanced automation capabilities.

item.title: Government Agency - Multi-Tenancy: Space as a Service
item.description: This Government Agency required a multifunctional and scalable workspace management system to serve various federal agencies. It must accurately authenticate users to manage and charge for space utilization, and provide a scalable model suitable for other government spaces facing underutilization.

item.title: NSW Health - Integrated Online Health Consultations
item.description: Gives clinicians, carers, and patients one system to manage consults, surveys, referrals, Medicare billing, education, and follow-ups — no plugins or patchwork tools.

item.title: How BMS Improve Commercial Building Sustainability
item.description: Explore new integrations that enhance ESG and sustainability in commercial buildings. Achieve your energy reduction goals and sustainability targets today!
